com.turnout.ws.controller

Class RewardsHasVoucherController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.controller.RewardsHasVoucherController

  • @RestController
@Path(value="/")
public class RewardsHasVoucherController
extends java.lang.Object
    RewardsHasVoucherController class is front face for accessing and manipulating reward and voucher related resources.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds. This class is registered with jersey resource configuration, So user can access it and its method by specified URI path template. It is acting like mapping class for reward and voucher and it allows to add voucher code into database map it to specific reward.

    • Method Detail

      • addRewardVoucher

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@POST
@Path(value="/addRewardVoucher")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject addRewardVoucher(org.json.simple.JSONObject rwdVou)
                                            throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                                   RewardNotFoundException,
                                                   VoucherNotFoundException
        This method used to add reward voucher. In this method voucher id mapped with reward id
        Parameters:
        rwdVou - A JSONOject contains information of voucher.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a value of success message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - Exception thrown when you try to convert string to number.
        RewardNotFoundException - Exception thrown when entered reward is not found in database.
        VoucherNotFoundException - Exception thrown when entered voucher is not found in database.
